# Darwhin Gomez

**Email:** Darwhin88@gmail.com  |  **Phone:** 347-491-2955  |  **Location:** New York, NY  
**LinkedIn:** [linkedin.com/in/darwhin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin)  |  **GitHub:** [github.com/dw8888](https://github.com/dw8888)  

---

## Professional Summary
Solutions-focused technologist with a robust background in software engineering and a proven track record in developing scalable applications and data-driven solutions. Proficient in Python, SQL, and modern frameworks, I excel in producing high-quality code with comprehensive test coverage. My hands-on experience in AWS and Azure environments, coupled with a commitment to continuous learning, positions me to contribute effectively to Meta's innovative projects. Eager to leverage my skills in a dynamic team to drive the next evolution in social technology.

## Education

Jun 2024
